netInt.visualElements

Class VCommunity

  • java.lang.Object
    • netInt.visualElements.primitives.VisualAtom
      • netInt.visualElements.VNode
        • netInt.visualElements.VCommunity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VCommunity
extends VNode
implements java.io.Serializable
    A community is defined as a subset of nodes linked to other nodes within the same subset.
    Author:
    jsalam
    See Also:

      • showCommunityContents

        public void showCommunityContents(boolean showNodes,
                         boolean showEdges)
        A community contains VisualAtoms that might be VNodes or VCommunities. Therefore a higher tier VCommunity may contain nested VCommunities. In order to display each VisualAtom correctly the class type is determined.
        Parameters:
        showNodes -
        showEdges -
